name: cssss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: syl6eqss(c0, c2, cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl6eqss(c0, c2, ((ocv ` c3)`((ocv ` c3)` c0)), c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0))))
-| wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0)), c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0))))
-| wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0)), c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0))))
-| wceq(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cocv, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =((ocv ` c3)`((ocv ` c3)` c0)))
⊣ (ocv ` c3)=(ocv ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0)), c2)
-| wceq(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cocv, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ⊆ c2)
⊣ ((ocv ` c3)`((ocv ` c3)` c0))⊆ c2
⊣ (ocv ` c3)=(ocv ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)

stmt.origin: ocvss(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0), c2, c3)
stmt.pretty: ocvss((ocv ` c3), ((ocv ` c3)` c0), c2, c3)

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c3), c0)), c2)
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cocv, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((ocv ` c3)`((ocv ` c3)` c0))⊆ c2
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (ocv ` c3)=(ocv ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cocv, c3), cfv(cocv, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ⊆ c2)
⊣ (ocv ` c3)=(ocv ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ⊆ c2)
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)

comment: A closed subspace is a subset of the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
